src:
Izpolnjeni v odnos
V odnos moramo celi, da ne bomo iskali svojih manjkajočih delov. Pred začetkom zveze počistimo negativne vzorce in pričakovanja.
03 Nov 2019, 07:00 by M. B. Z.
Predvsem ženske, ki se nimajo rade, se pogosto zadovoljijo z odnosom s krutimi, nezvestimi, neprimernimi, včasih celo nasilnimi partnerji, samo da ne bi bile same. To odraža globok občutek lastne nevrednosti, pravijo guruji, ki ga je treba pozdraviti, če nočemo znova in znova ustvarjati enakih odnosov.Če notranje potrebe niso zadovoljene, za vsako ceno iščemo nekoga, ki bi nas imel rad in nam dal tisto, po čemer hrepenimo, namesto da bi težili k celosti in notranji izpolnjenosti, preden začnemo odnos. Če vanj ne gremo celi, bomo zunaj sebe vedno iskali svoje manjkajoče delčke.Tako so ženske pripravljene biti z nekom tudi samo za obljubo ljubezni. Sem spadajo zunajzakonski trikotniki, ki prinašajo obljubo, upanje, s katerim ženska reši svoj trenutni problem, čeprav se na dolgi rok izkaže, da so bili obeti o srečni prihodnosti le iluzija. Lekciji, ki se ju morajo naučiti ob tem, sta, kako postaviti mejo in si realno postaviti lastno vrednost, si reči, da so vredne več, in tudi če nihče nikoli ne pride v njihovo življenje, niso pripravljene spustiti kriterijev na svojo škodo.Velika težava pri tem je mit romantične ljubezni, ki je posledica družbe, v kateri živimo. Navajeni smo, da naše potrebe niso zadovoljene in da bo to rešilo nekaj zunanjega. Enako kot tešimo svoja negativna čustvena stanja z nakupovanjem, omamo, alkoholom in bežanjem v svet televizije in interneta, želimo zapolniti notranjo praznino z novim partnerjem.Ne zavedamo pa se, da če sebi nismo dovolj dobri partnerji, ne moremo dobiti nekoga, ki nas bo reševal in bogatil, ampak samo nekoga, ki nam bo pokazal vse naše pomanjkljivosti, kajti odnosi vedno odražajo stanje, v katerem smo. Guruji priporočajo, da že pred začetkom zveze počistimo svoje negativne vzorce, pričakovanja, nerealne želje in prepričanja ter vstopimo v odnos čim bolj izpolnjeni in celostni.
text:
Filled into a relationship
We need to get into the relationship so that we don't look for our missing parts. Before we start a relationship, we clear the negative patterns and expectations.
03 Nov 2019, 07:00 by M. B. Z.
Above all, women who dislike each other often become content with relationships with cruel, infidel, inappropriate, sometimes even violent partners, just to not be alone. This reflects a deep sense of self-worth, say gurus, who must be welcomed if we do not want to have the same relationship again and again.If internal needs are not met, we are looking for someone who would love us and give us what we crave , rather than striving for wholeness and inner fulfillment before starting a relationship. If we do not go whole, we will always seek out our missing fragments outside of us. Thus, women are ready to be with someone even for the promise of love. These include extramarital triangles that deliver on the promise, the hope with which a woman resolves her current problem, even though in the long run it turns out that the prospects of a happy future were only an illusion. The lessons they need to learn along these lines are how to set a boundary and realistically set their own value, tell themselves that they are worth more, and even if no one ever comes into their lives, they are not ready to let go of the criteria to their detriment. the problem with this is the myth of romantic love that results from the society we live in. We are used to the fact that our needs are not being met and that this will solve something external. Just as we quell our negative emotional states by shopping, stunning, alcohol, and escaping into the world of television and the Internet, we want to fill the inner void with a new partner. saving and enriching, but only someone who will show us all our shortcomings, because relationships always reflect the situation we are in. Gurus recommend that we clear our negative patterns, expectations, unrealistic desires and beliefs before the beginning of the relationship and enter into a relationship as fulfilled and holistic as possible.
